sites.name: Stripe Documentation
sites.description: Stripe's documentation is renowned for its clarity, comprehensive API references, and interactive code examples. It seamlessly blends tutorials, guides, and references with an elegant design that makes complex payment integrations approachable.

sites.name: Vercel Documentation
sites.description: Vercel's documentation excels at guiding users from zero to deployed. It features a clean, modern design with excellent navigation, contextual examples, and seamless integration between conceptual content and practical guides.

sites.name: Tailwind CSS
sites.description: Tailwind CSS documentation combines beautiful design with exceptional usability. Features instant search, interactive examples, and a unique approach to organizing utility classes that makes finding what you need effortless.

sites.name: GitHub Docs
sites.description: GitHub's documentation is a masterclass in organizing complex information. It provides multiple learning paths, version-specific content, and excellent navigation that helps users find answers quickly regardless of their expertise level.

sites.name: React Documentation
sites.description: The new React documentation sets a gold standard for teaching complex concepts. With interactive sandboxes, challenges, and a thoughtful progression from basics to advanced topics, it transforms documentation into an engaging learning experience.

sites.name: MDN Web Docs
sites.description: MDN Web Docs is the definitive resource for web developers. Its comprehensive coverage, browser compatibility tables, and community-maintained content make it an indispensable reference for web technologies.

sites.name: Supabase Documentation
sites.description: Supabase documentation combines beautiful aesthetics with practical content. It features framework-specific quickstarts, comprehensive guides, and an excellent balance between high-level concepts and implementation details.

sites.name: Astro Documentation
sites.description: Astro's documentation provides clear guidance for building content-focused websites. It features excellent organization, practical examples, and a progressive learning path that helps developers understand the framework's unique approach to web development.

sites.name: New Relic Documentation
sites.description: New Relic's documentation offers comprehensive coverage of observability and monitoring solutions. It provides detailed guides, API references, and practical examples that help users instrument and monitor their applications effectively.
highlights: Robust content system that feeds in-app product features

sites.name: Apollo GraphQL Documentation
sites.description: Apollo GraphQL's documentation excels with exceptional interactivity and visual design. It features comprehensive code examples, in-depth tutorials, and intuitive navigation that makes learning GraphQL and Apollo's tools engaging and accessible.

sites.name: Netlify Documentation
sites.description: Netlify's documentation combines excellent organization with practical, task-oriented guidance. It features clear deployment workflows, comprehensive framework guides, and an effective balance between getting-started tutorials and in-depth feature documentation.

sites.name: Twilio Documentation
sites.description: Twilio's documentation stands out with its comprehensive API coverage, practical code examples in multiple languages, and excellent quickstart guides. It seamlessly guides developers from initial setup to production implementation across their communication platform.

sites.name: Next.js Documentation
sites.description: Next.js documentation provides a comprehensive guide to the React framework for production. It features excellent code examples, MDX-powered content, and AI-integrated help. The documentation covers multiple versions with a robust design and clear explanations.
highlights: AI integrated (Ask AI, markdown pages at same URL paths)
